title: Mastery Tokens in ARAM, Rito Plz
body:
It's well known by anyone who frequents the OCE boards, I am an ARAM only player.

I currently have 27 champs at mastery level 5, and countless more that are nearly there.
What is the justification for not getting tokens in ARAM?
If it were ranked only, I'd understand and accept it, but if you can get tokens in norms, why not in ARAM?

Some guy can get a token for getting an S grade in Bronze 5 level norms on the rift, but I can't get a token for getting an S grade against golds/plats/diamonds in ARAM?
What is the logic here?

replies.body: ARAM is a dead game mode and should just be removed tbh.

>
> ARAM is a dead game mode and should just be removed tbh.

You're a dead game mode and should be removed.
The problem with this situation is Riot isn't going to compensate for one guy who only plays ARAM...

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AmaIn8lb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-01-30T03:48:13.481+0000)
>
> The problem with this situation is Riot isn't going to compensate for one guy who only plays ARAM...

Lots of people only play ARAM.

https://i.imgur.com/zpnpm3z.gifv

I don't see them anywhere
never heard of the people who have ARAM only accounts?

While I do think it is unfair to aram players such as yourself to not be able to earn mastery with a champion.
I dont think you should be able to earn the same tokens that you can earn in summoners rift.

Yes, some champion's skills transfer across no problem, like Jax or Gangplank or Mundo etc.

But others do not.
Can you really parade around lvl 7 Ivern, when you've never cleared a single jungle camp in your time playing him?
Should you be allowed lvl 7 Taliyah, when your worked ground doesn't last anywhere near as long, and you have never used your ult for anything other than coming back to lane faster?
A Yorick that has never split pushed?
Nasus who as holy ever built AP and never bothered to farm Q?
Lee Sin who has never ward jumped in his life?
Kindred who has never counter jungled?

Aram is great fun, often more fun than normals. but the champ you play in aram is not always the same champ you play on the Rift.
So you have not necessarily 'mastered' that champ, when they are quite different to play in different playstyles.

Perhaps there should be 3 mastery banners you can achieve, one for the rift, one for 3's and one for aram?
An alternate mastery for ARAM would be fine with me.

I think I like this idea best. So far as I know the reason for not getting tokens in ARAM (or any other gamemode) is that SR is the primary gamemode, and the skillset you'd need with a champion to be considered 'good' for your rank is going to be way different from SR to ARAM (ARAM is more about mechanics, SR is about a bit of everything). Even if you could only flash your ARAM mastery in ARAM I reckon it'd still be worth.
lol, half of my problem would be solved by this
